items.content_html: A lightweight, fully client-side SEPA XML (ISO 20022 `pain.001.001.03`) viewer and parser written in JavaScript. This tool helps users parse and visualize batch SEPA Credit Transfer XML files directly in the browser — no upload to backend!
items.title: roverbird/sepa-pain-js: A lightweight, fully client-side SEPA XML (ISO 20022 `pain.001.001.03`) viewer and parser written in JavaScript. This tool helps users parse and visualize batch SEPA Credit Transfer XML files directly in the browser — no upload to backend!

items.content_html: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.
items.title: simstudioai/sim: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
items.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.

items.content_html: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.
items.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js service built with Express, Mongoose, and prom-client that collects metrics from your LibreChat MongoDB database and exposes them on a "/metrics" endpoint for Prometheus scraping. Easily integrate with Grafana dashboards for comprehensive monitoring and visualization.
items.title: rubentalstra/librechat-prom-exporter: A lightweight Node.js service built with Express, Mongoose, and prom-client that collects metrics from your LibreChat MongoDB database and exposes them on a "/metrics" endpoint for Prometheus scraping. Easily integrate with Grafana dashboards for comprehensive monitoring and visualization.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
items.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: A Node.js automation tool using Puppeteer to log in to a website, submit input to a field, extract data from the result page, and expose the output via an API. Ideal for lightweight web scraping and integration into other services.
items.title: mohonthecyberghost/puppeteer-api-scraper: A Node.js automation tool using Puppeteer to log in to a website, submit input to a field, extract data from the result page, and expose the output via an API. Ideal for lightweight web scraping and integration into other services.

items.content_html: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
items.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

items.content_html: This project is an Educase India Node.js assignment. It features a lightweight Express.js and Prisma backend with MySQL, offering APIs to add schools and list them by proximity to a user's location. Optimized for serverless deployment.
items.title: rupayn/school_management-api: This project is an Educase India Node.js assignment. It features a lightweight Express.js and Prisma backend with MySQL, offering APIs to add schools and list them by proximity to a user's location. Optimized for serverless deployment.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
